title: How to avoid decisions
creator_credit: Seven Dimensions, Victorian Film Corporation, Australian Film Commission, Eve Ash and Ted Robinson
brief_description: A humorous training video written by Ian McFadyen in the pre-Cleese era which aims to develop decision-making skills by examining common ways of avoiding decisions. A character called Art Dodger defends his title as World Decision-Avoiding champion and must prevent his staff from forcing him to face up to his decision making responsibilities. Provides a step-by-step process for effective decision-making. Cast includes Graeme Blundell.
